pageProduct.name: Arthro Aid Direct Cream Pump 240g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

To relieve the symtoms of mild rheumatic aches and pains and muscles strains.
Arthro-Aid Direct contains camphor, menthol and other ingredients in a non-greasy base. Arthro-Aid Cream is easy to apply and includes skin care moisturisers.
Camphor and menthol are traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to reduce mild rheumatic aches and pains. Camphor also helps relieve the symptoms of muscle sprain in traditional Western herbal medicine.

Warnings

ALLERGY WARNING: Contains fish and crustacean products. Glucosamine is derived from seafood.
CAUTIONS
Avoid contact with eyes.
Children, pregnant or breastfeeding women and those who have recently had a heart attack, surgery or a major accident should not use this product without medical advice.
If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional. 
The colour may vary due to seasonal colour variation of the nature ingredient Aloe Vera.
Do not use if carton seal is missing, torn or broken.

Common Uses

To relieve the symtoms of mild rheumatic aches and pains and muscles strains.

Ingredients

- Camphor 32mg 
- Menthol 5mg 
- Peppermint Oil 1mg 
      equiv. Menthol 300 micrograms 
- Shark Cartlidge 20mg 
- Bovine Sodium Chondroitin Sulphate 5mg 
- Glucosamine sulphate 3mg 
- Aloe Vera Juice fresh 4mg 
- DI-alpha-tocopherol acetate 2.5mg 
      equiv. dI-alpha-tocopherol (vitamin E) 2.3mg 
- Dexpanthenol 2mg 

Directions

Cleanse, rinse and dry skin prior to application.
Apply generously to affected areas and gently massage until the cream disappears.
Use 2-3 times daily.
